thread.title: Peter
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text: David Sklar & Associates Inc. helped me overcome a huge financial hiccup. In particular, Ms. Ashley Carter facilitated this entire process smoothly, and assisted me in achieving a new beginning! Thank you, Ms. Carter and thank you David Sklar & Associates Inc. .
